title: Calories in Chipotle Guac
meta_description: Discover calories in Chipotle guac per serving, including fat, carbs, protein, sodium, and tweaks for your burrito bowl or taco.
assumptions: Standard Chipotle guacamole serving (4 oz / 113 g), made with Hass avocados, lime juice, cilantro, red onion, jalape√±o, salt; no modifications.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by location, portion size, and ingredients; Chipotle values may change. Check app or menu for latest.

quick_answer.text: One serving of Chipotle guac provides 230 kcal, mostly from healthy fats.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Mix with tomatoes for pico de gallo style

faqs.q: How many calories in Chipotle guac?
faqs.a: About 230 kcal per standard 4 oz serving.
Yes, 9 g carbs with 7 g fiber, netting ~2 g.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in Chipotle guac?
faqs.a: 21 g total fat per serving, mostly from avocados (healthy monounsaturated).

faqs.q: How much sodium in Chipotle guac?
faqs.a: Around 370 mg per serving due to added salt.

faqs.q: Can I get less calories in Chipotle guac?
faqs.a: Opt for a half portion (~115 kcal) or no-salt prep to reduce slightly.
